*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Elias R. Wightman, April 4, 1830. Order for survey.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr. E. R. Weightman*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr Sir,*person_mentioned* Col Wallace*/person_mentioned* and company wish to take a look at that *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*he wishes to get a place on *location_mentioned*Prairie Creek*/location_mentioned*, and I have told him that you could point out the places that are selected there by the *person_mentioned*emigrants */person_mentioned*who came with you—-*/p*
*p*If the leagues are not yet layed off on the *location_mentioned*west side of Colorado */location_mentioned*I wish an alteration made which is this—run one League next *location_mentioned*below *person_mentioned*H. H. League*/person_mentioned*s tract,*/location_mentioned* then one quarter for *person_mentioned*Harrison */person_mentioned*next below that, then *location_mentioned*run League tracts below *person_mentioned*Harrison*/person_mentioned*'s*/location_mentioned*— This differs from the memorandum I left you in this—that memorandum directed you to lay off *location_mentioned*three quarters below *person_mentioned*H. H. League*/person_mentioned*s tract-*/location_mentioned*- Should it appe[a]r that the quarter for *person_mentioned*Harrison */person_mentioned*will not include the place he wants you may run one more quarter so as to make it hit, for I wish *person_mentioned*Harrison */person_mentioned*to get the place he has selected—that is, you will run one or two quarters next *location_mentioned*below the adjoining League to H. H. Leagues tract,*/location_mentioned* as it may be necessary so as to make*location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Harrison*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* hit right-- There are a number of tracts promised on that *location_mentioned*river */location_mentioned*and I want as many as the land will admit*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F, Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="04-04-1830">April 4, 1830*/date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
